data.actual_result: Text under 'Recent Mentions' stays with what you opened it as.
data.expected_result: Text under 'Recent Mentions' changes to what set of mentions you're currently looking at.
data.short_description: Recent mentions titlebar does not change depending on looking at specific server or all servers.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up any server you've been pinged on. - Swipe left and tap on the '@' at the bottom to bring up recent mentions. - Note if you are currently looking at mentions for all servers or a specific one. - Tap the top right button to change it to the option you aren't on.
